entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Fog patches in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
